鶅鶅鶅

鶅字的基本解释

鶅
zī
古代对野鸡的别称。
鵵轨鸟（一说是猫头鹰）。

鶅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zī］
［《廣韻》側持切，平之，莊。］
［《廣韻》側吏切，去志，莊。］
见“鶅雉”。

鶅字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鶅； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1493第18
【廣韻】側持切【集韻】【韻會】莊持切【正韻】旨而切，?音甾。東方雉也。【爾雅·釋鳥】東方曰鶅。【疏】東方雉名。又【爾雅·釋鳥】鶅鵵軌。【註】義未詳。又【廣韻】【集韻】?側吏切，音胾。義同。

鶅字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鶅字的起名意思

暂无。

鶅
Basic explanation of words
鶅
zī
Another name for pheasant in ancient times.
Orbital bird (in one case, it is an owl).
鶅
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zī］
["Guangyun" side-cut, Pingzhi, Zhuang. ]
["Guangyun" side officials cut, go to Zhi, Zhuang. ]
See "Pheasant".
鶅
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鶅; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1493 Page 18
[Guang Yun] Side holding cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Zhuang holding cutting [Zheng Yun] cutting with purpose,? Yin steroid. Eastern pheasants also. 【Erya·Shiniao】The East is called 鶅. [Sparse] Oriental pheasant name. Also【Erya·Shiniao】鶅鵵絵. [Note] The meaning is not specified. Also [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Side officials cut, sound sub. The same meaning.
鶅

鶅
